title: Franki22
author: Franki22
content: Exchange.Rubic Card â€“ The Future of PaymentThe Rubic Exchange has recently introduced a new feature, the Rubic Card, which is a revolutionary step towards the future of payment. To make the deal even sweeter, Rubic Exchange is offering an exclusive promotion for early adopters â€“ when you register your Rubic Card, you will receive 1,000 USDT as a welcome bonus! This is a fantastic opportunity for cryptocurrency enthusiasts to start using their digital assets for everyday purchases and transactions.Â The Rubic Card also offers unparalleled security, with advanced encryption technology and multi-signature authorization to ensure that your funds are always safe and secure. With the rise of cyber threats and hacking attempts, security is a top priority for any digital payment method, and the Rubic Card delivers on that front.Â In addition to its security features, the Rubic Card also offers low fees and high transaction speeds, making it a cost-effective and efficient way to make payments. Whether youâ€™re purchasing everyday items, making international transfers, or investing in new opportunities, the Rubic Card provides a seamless experience that is unmatched by traditional banking methods.Â The future of payment is here, and itâ€™s in the form of the Rubic Card. With its user-friendly interface, top-notch security measures, and low fees, this innovative card is set to revolutionize the way we transact with digital assets. Donâ€™t miss out on this exciting opportunity â€“ register your Rubic Card today and start enjoying the benefits of the future of payment.The article is taken from official medium ExchangeRubic.

comments.author: JuliaTrader
comments.body: Good day to all of you! I didn't expect to see an advertisement for this project here . I have been working with this exchange for a long time and have heard only positive reviews. I built a referral system with my Twitter followers. You can register using my referral link and receive regular Altcoin signals. The project is multifaceted and definitely deserves wide attention. Here is my referral link: https://exchange.rubic.su/signup?ref=98

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Franki22 on December 15, 2023, 02:45:56 PMTo make the deal even sweeter, Rubic Exchange is offering an exclusive promotion for early adopters â€“ when you register your Rubic Card, you will receive 1,000 USDT as a welcome bonus! This is a fantastic opportunity for cryptocurrency enthusiasts to start using their digital assets for everyday purchases and transactions.No way! So I just sign up and boom the 1,000 USDT bonus is mine just like that? No strings attached?Rubic must really be so rich. Even Binance and Bybit didn't give me more than $50 sign up bonuses all together. Where do you get all that money from?You also say you support more than 15,500 tokens. On coingecko they are 11,482 tokens listed there. Where do you get the rest of your tokens from?

comments.author: Franki22
comments.body: I don't go into cryptocurrency, I'm an investor and rarely use a bot to trade. But as I know.Rubic have been working for a long time, and have ventures and shares, as well as their own token, due to which it is easy for them to attractNew users.

comments.author: God Of Thunder

If you are not official, why did you create an ANN thread? A Platform can have one ANN at a time. What if their official decide to create one?

comments.author: Crypto Library
comments.body: Quote from: Learn Bitcoin on December 16, 2023, 06:52:34 AM Do you know that only officials can create an ANN thread? If you are not official, why did you create an ANN thread? A Platform can have one ANN at a time. What if their official decide to create one? Maybe he knows that ANN thread can only be opened by officials, but still, he opened maybe to get some referrals, for affiliate marketing.See under the topic a newly registered account has posted with a referral link. Moreover, I saw him open another topic about a casino on the Gambling board, there he also used the old strategy and gave the referral code under the post. 1win Betting Casino: Unlocking the Benefits with NewYearNFT Promo Code.@Franki22 Buddy, I don't think your this strategy will work, It has become very old a long time ago.
